task.title: Maintaining your hard drive
task.shortdesc: Here are a few tips for maintaining your hard drive.

taskbody.context: There is really not much to do to maintain a hard drive. However, if you want to keep it running for the next 10 years or so, you should follow these suggestions.

step.cmd: If your drive has a low-power mode, make sure this comes on when your drive is sitting idle.
step.stepresult: It will not get worn out as quickly if it is not needlessly spinning.

step.cmd: Every once in a while, shake your computer.
step.info:
This will cause the bits to fall more comfortably in to place
